sentences.sContent: All his life was submerged in the liberation of the people.
sentences.sContent_eng: All his life was submerged in the liberation of the people.
sentences.sCn: 他的一生全部献身于人民的解放事业。

sentences.sContent: They consecrated their lives to the liberation of their motherland.
sentences.sContent_eng: They consecrated their lives to the liberation of their motherland.
sentences.sCn: 他们把生命献给了祖国的解放事业。

sentences.sContent: ...Women's liberation opened up new professional opportunities for women...

phrases.pCn: 妇女解放运动，女权运动

words.tran: 无拘束的；放纵的（尤指在社交和性关系方面）
解放；使摆脱束缚（liberate的过去式）
